titles.title: Strategic Airlift Force Structure Reform Act of 2011
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to modify certain authorities relating to the strategic airlift aircraft force structure of the Air Force.
Strategic Airlift Force Structure Reform Act of 2011

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Strategic Airlift Force Structure Reform Act of 2011 - Reduces the minimum inventory of strategic airlift aircraft required to be maintained by the Secretary of the Air Force to 301 aircraft. (Current law requires the Secretary to maintain at least 316 of such aircraft.)
